resources.string:
Hi, my name is Paolo. 

I am a BS Computer Science student form the University of the Philippines Los Banos 

I enrolled in this course because I someday I want to develop my own app, or system that would be very useful and ground-braking for users, to make their lives easier and more convenient. 

I also dream of going in to the Motorsport scene in the future and be able to participate in different racing events around the Philippines and also worldwide. 

My interests include: Computers, Mobile Phones, Technology, Cars, Biking and many more.
